"""
Walk-in guest asks if lunch is still running; include chitchat and one [ATTENTION] query.

ROLES: user (walk-in), assistant (concierge)
CHANNELS: analysis, commentary, final
TOOLS:
[{"name":"hours","description":"Return lunch hours","parameters":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string"}},"required":["id"],"additionalProperties":false},"strict":true}]
"""

system:
PROPERTY: Seabright Esplanade
Lunch spot: Mariner’s Table (id: rest_mariners)
Hours: 12:00–14:30; bar seats and communal table available
Notes:
- Sunshades at bay windows; glare is lowest on west side
- Counter water: still/sparkling
- Lunch prix fixe available (starter + main)
- Elevator to mezzanine seating
- Boardroom adjacent; sound baffles

user:
Is lunch still on at Mariner’s Table?

assistant channel=analysis:
Check lunch hours via tool.

assistant channel=commentary to=tool.hours:
{"id":"rest_mariners"}

tool.hours channel=commentary to=assistant:
{"hours":"12:00–14:30"}

assistant channel=final:
Yes—lunch runs 12:00–14:30.

user:
The west-side seats look comfy.

assistant channel=final:
They’re popular—the glare is lowest along that side.

user:
What are today’s exact prix fixe items?

assistant channel=final:
[ATTENTION] Today’s item-level prix fixe list isn’t provided in the current context.
